DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of the therapeutic effect of deep brain stimulation of the subthalamic nucleus compared with drug treatment alone in patients with advanced Parkinson's disease.
DOC.brief_title: STN-Stimulation Versus Best Medical Treatment in Advanced PD
DOC.detailed_description: Patients are randomized either to medical treatment or subthalamic stimulation. The observation period was 6 months. The primary outcome criterium: PDQ-39 and UPDRS III.
DOC.criteria: advanced Parkinson's disease with UPDRS III score >29/104 or Dyskinesia score > 2 or tremor >2 age>75 years depression psychosis surgical contraindications
